text: 3.9 Lom 3.21-22, 9.30, 10.3-6, Gal 2.16 Chɨgɨl, nop yɨl pɨsnep mɨdenɨm. Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gen amnɨmuŋ, yad God yɨp nɨgek bɨ suŋtep mɨdenɨm agɨl gos ma nepin. Mel yɨbɨl. Klays nop gos lɨnɨgen amnɨmuŋ, yad God yɨp nɨgek bɨ suŋtep mɨdenɨm agɨl gos nepin. Yad Klays nop gos lɨnepin ak nɨm, God ne gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd agek, yad bɨ suŋtep mɨdebin.
